Design System

  • Documentation will trigger a new window or tab.
  • Github will trigger a new window or tab.

Components

This is the Components page.

  • Overview Download FAQ
  • Components
    • Buttons
    • Forms
    • Side Navigation
  • Content
    • Colors
    • Elevation
    • Icons
    • Typography

Components

Buttons

These are notes associated with the button components.

Primary

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled</button>

Outline

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline">Outline</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline" disabled>Disabled</button>

Flat

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-flat">Flat</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-flat active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-flat" disabled>Disabled</button>

Text

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link">Text</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link" disabled>Disabled</button>

Large

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-lg">Large</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-lg active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-lg" disabled>Disabled</button>

Small

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm">Small</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm" disabled>Disabled</button>

Block

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block">Block</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block" disabled>Disabled</button>

Button Animations

Animations not yet complete.

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Ripple</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Loading</button>
	
<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Primary</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;Primary&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary active"&gt;Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled&gt;Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Outline</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline">Outline</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline"&gt;Outline&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline active"&gt;Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline" disabled&gt;Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Flat</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-flat">Flat</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-flat active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-flat" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-flat"&gt;Flat&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-flat active">Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-flat" disabled>Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Text</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link">Text</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-link"&gt;Text&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-link active">Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-link" disabled>Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Large</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">Large</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-lg"&gt;Large&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-lg active">Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-lg" disabled>Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Small</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-sm">Small</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-sm active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-sm" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-sm"&gt;Small&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-sm active">Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-sm" disabled>Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Block</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block">Block</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block active">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block"&gt;Block&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block active">Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block" disabled>Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Button Animations</h4>
	<p>Animations not yet complete.</p>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Ripple</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Loading</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;Ripple&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;Loading&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

Forms

These are notes associated with the form component.

For more information on Bootstrap's classes for form layouts, control sizing, validation and so on, refer to Bootstrap's form documentation.

Email Field

We'll never share your email with anyone else. 
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="form-control-label">Email Address</label>
				<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter email">
				<small class="text-muted">We'll never share your email with anyone else.</small>
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Telephone Field

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputTel" class="form-control-label">Telephone</label>
				<input type="tel" class="form-control" id="exampleInputTel" placeholder="Enter phone number">
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Date Field

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputDate" class="form-control-label">Date</label>
				<input type="date" class="form-control" id="exampleInputTel">
			</fieldset>
		</form>

International Address

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress1">Street Address</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress1" placeholder="Enter Street Address">
			</fieldset>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress2">Address Line 2</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress2" placeholder="Enter Address Line 2">
			</fieldset>
			<div class="form-inline">
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleCity">City</label>
					<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleCity" placeholder="Enter City">
				</fieldset>
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleState">State/Province/Region</label>
					<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleState" placeholder="Enter State/Province/Region">
				</fieldset>
			</div>
			<div class="form-inline">
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleZip">Zip/Postal Code</label>
					<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleZip" placeholder="Enter Zip/Postal Code">
				</fieldset>
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleCountry">Country</label>
					<select class="form-control" id="exampleCountry">
						<option>Country 1</option>
						<option>Country 2</option>
						<option>Country 3</option>
						<option>Country 4</option>
						<option>Country 5</option>
				    </select>
				</fieldset>
			</div>
		</form>

USA Address

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress3">Street Address</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress3" placeholder="Enter Street Address">
			</fieldset>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress4">Address Line 2</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress4" placeholder="Enter Address Line 2">
			</fieldset>
			<div class="form-inline">
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleCity1">City</label>
					<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleCity1" placeholder="Enter City">
				</fieldset>
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleState1">State</label>
					<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleState1" placeholder="Enter State">
				</fieldset>
			</div>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleZip1">Zip Code</label>
				<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleZip1" placeholder="Enter Zip Code">
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Password Field

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputPassword1" class="form-control-label">Password</label>
				<input type="password" class="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Enter Password">
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Select Box

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleSelect1" class="form-control-label">Select Box</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="exampleSelect1">
				  <option>1</option>
				  <option>2</option>
				  <option>3</option>
				  <option>4</option>
				  <option>5</option>
				</select>
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Multiple Select Box

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleSelect2" class="form-control-label">Multiple Select Box</label>
				<select multiple class="form-control" id="exampleSelect2">
				  <option>1</option>
				  <option>2</option>
				  <option>3</option>
				  <option>4</option>
				  <option>5</option>
				</select>
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Custom Select Box

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleSelect1" class="form-control-label">Custom Select</label>
				<select class="c-select" id="exampleSelect1">
				  <option>Red</option>
				  <option>Blue</option>
				  <option>Green</option>
				  <option>Yellow</option>
				  <option>Orange</option>
				</select>
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Text Field

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputText1" class="form-control-label">Text Field</label>
				<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleInputText1" placeholder="Enter Text">
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Textarea

		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleTextarea" class="form-control-label">Textarea</label>
				<textarea class="form-control" id="exampleTextarea" rows="3"></textarea>
			</fieldset>
		</form>

Radio Options

		<form>
			<div class="radio">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios1" value="option1" checked>
				  Option one is this and that—be sure to include why it's great
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="radio">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios2" value="option2">
				  Option two can be something else and selecting it will deselect option one
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="radio disabled">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios3" value="option3" disabled>
				  Option three is disabled
				</label>
			</div>
		</form>

Checkbox

		<form>
			<div class="checkbox">
				<label>
				  <input type="checkbox"> Check me out
				</label>
			</div>
		</form>

Inline Forms: Visible Labels

		<form class="form-inline">
		  <div class="form-group">
		    <label for="exampleInputName2">Name</label>
		    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleInputName2" placeholder="Jane Doe">
		  </div>
		  <div class="form-group">
		    <label for="exampleInputEmail2">Email</label>
		    <input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail2" placeholder="jane.doe@example.com">
		  </div>
		  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Send invitation</button>
		</form>

Inline Forms: Hidden Labels

		<form class="form-inline">
		  <div class="form-group">
		    <label class="sr-only" for="exampleInputEmail3">Email address</label>
		    <input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail3" placeholder="Enter email">
		  </div>
		  <div class="form-group">
		    <label class="sr-only" for="exampleInputPassword3">Password</label>
		    <input type="password" class="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword3" placeholder="Password">
		  </div>
		  <div class="checkbox">
		    <label>
		      <input type="checkbox"> Remember me
		    </label>
		  </div>
		  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Sign in</button>
		</form>
	
<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Email Field</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group row">
				<label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="col-sm-3 form-control-label">Email Address</label>
				<div class="col-sm-6">
					<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter email">
					<small class="text-muted">We'll never share your email with anyone else.</small>
				</div>
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>

	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;form&gt;
			&lt;fieldset class="form-group"&gt;
				&lt;label for="exampleInputEmail1" class="form-control-label"&gt;Email Address&lt;/label&gt;
				&lt;input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter email"&gt;
				&lt;small class="text-muted">We'll never share your email with anyone else.&lt;/small&gt;
			&lt;/fieldset&gt;
		&lt;/form&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Telephone Field</h4>

				<label for="exampleInputTel" class="col-sm-3 col-md-2 form-control-label">Telephone</label>

					<input type="tel" class="form-control" id="exampleInputTel" placeholder="Enter phone number">

				    </select>

	</div>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">USA Address</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress3">Street Address</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress3" placeholder="Enter Street Address">
			</fieldset>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress4">Address Line 2</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress4" placeholder="Enter Address Line 2">
			</fieldset>
			<div class="form-inline">
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleCity1">City</label>
					<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleCity1" placeholder="Enter City">
				</fieldset>
				<fieldset class="form-group">
					<label for="exampleState1">State</label>
					<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleState1" placeholder="Enter State">
				</fieldset>
			</div>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleZip1">Zip Code</label>
				<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleZip1" placeholder="Enter Zip Code">
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;form&gt;
			&lt;fieldset class="form-group"&gt;
				&lt;label for="exampleInputAddress3"&gt;Street Address&lt;/label&gt;
				&lt;input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress3" placeholder="Enter Street Address"&gt;
			&lt;/fieldset&gt;
			&lt;fieldset class="form-group"&gt;
				&lt;label for="exampleInputAddress4"&gt;Address Line 2&lt;/label&gt;
				&lt;input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress4" placeholder="Enter Address Line 2"&gt;
			&lt;/fieldset&gt;
			&lt;div class="form-inline"&gt;
				&lt;fieldset class="form-group"&gt;
					&lt;label for="exampleCity1"&gt;City&lt;/label&gt;
					&lt;input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleCity1" placeholder="Enter City"&gt;
				&lt;/fieldset&gt;
				&lt;fieldset class="form-group"&gt;
					&lt;label for="exampleState1"&gt;State&lt;/label&gt;
					&lt;input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleState1" placeholder="Enter State"&gt;
				&lt;/fieldset&gt;
			&lt;/div&gt;
			&lt;fieldset class="form-group"&gt;
				&lt;label for="exampleZip1"&gt;Zip Code&lt;/label&gt;
				&lt;input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleZip1" placeholder="Enter Zip Code"&gt;
			&lt;/fieldset&gt;
		&lt;/form&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Radio Options</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<div class="radio">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios1" value="option1" checked>
				  Option one is this and that&mdash;be sure to include why it's great
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="radio">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios2" value="option2">
				  Option two can be something else and selecting it will deselect option one
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="radio disabled">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios3" value="option3" disabled>
				  Option three is disabled
				</label>
			</div>
		</form>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;form&gt;
			&lt;div class="radio"&gt;
				&lt;label&gt;
				  &lt;input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios1" value="option1" checked&gt;
				  Option one is this and that&mdash;be sure to include why it's great
				&lt;/label&gt;
			&lt;/div&gt;
			&lt;div class="radio"&gt;
				&lt;label&gt;
				  &lt;input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios2" value="option2"&gt;
				  Option two can be something else and selecting it will deselect option one
				&lt;/label&gt;
			&lt;/div&gt;
			&lt;div class="radio disabled"&gt;
				&lt;label&gt;
				  &lt;input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios3" value="option3" disabled&gt;
				  Option three is disabled
				&lt;/label&gt;
			&lt;/div&gt;
		&lt;/form&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

			</div>
			<div class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputEmail2">Email</label>

			</div>
			<button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Send invitation</button>
		</form>
	</div>

			</div>
			<div class="form-group">
				<label class="sr-only" for="exampleInputPassword3">Password</label>

		    </label>

		  &lt;/div&gt;
		  &lt;div class="form-group"&gt;
		    &lt;label class="sr-only" for="exampleInputPassword3">Password&lt;/label&gt;

		  &lt;/div&gt;
		  &lt;div class="checkbox"&gt;
		    &lt;label&gt;
		      &lt;input type="checkbox"&gt; Remember me
		    &lt;/label&gt;
		  &lt;/div&gt;
		  &lt;button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;Sign in&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;/form&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

Side Navigation

The nav class is a Bootstrap default whereas we're adding a custom class sidebar to further customize for Design System.

Sidebar: Single Level

  • Current Parent
  • Parent Link
  • Parent Link
  • Parent Link 
    <ul class="nav sidebar">
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Current Parent</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
    </ul>

Sidebar: Two Levels

  • Parent Link
  • Parent Link
    • Child Link
    • Child Link
    • Child Link
  • Parent Link 
    <ul class="nav sidebar">
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
        <ul class="nav">
          <li class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Current Child</a>
          </li>
          <li class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link</a>
          </li>
          <li class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link</a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
    </ul>
